page.title: 17ROAD AND RIVER TRAFFIC
page.content: Shipping. Transport passing through block per annum. Figures supplied by Humber Pilots' Office. General cargo to and from Trent Port: 4,176 vessels. General cargo to and from Ouse Ports: 4,037 vessels. Travelling to and from Europe 63%, Scandinavia 11%, Baltic 10%, Mediterranean 6%, U.K. 7%, Others 3%. Barge traffic per annum: Petroleum and Chemicals 5,500 movements p.a., Sand, gravel and general cargo 2,100, Effluent and Waste for dumping 1,000. Road Transport Survey A63 : 25.4.85 7a.m.to 7p.m. Supplied by Humberside County Council: 9479 vehicles. Eastbound 25%, Westbound 24% HGV & PSV's. Ministry of Transport survey 1984_1985 daily figures range from 9,000_9,899 in both directions with little seasonal variation.
